Card-1.title: Vimtutor
Card-1.imgAlt: Text result of running vimtutor in terminal; beginning of program.
Card-1.text: Worth doing at least once, most helpful resource. Open in terminal.

Card-2.title: Vim Genius
Card-2.imgAlt: Has a review and testing feature, as well as a tutorial.
Card-2.text: Landing page for Vim genius, has a button saying start now along with a screencap of a terminal.

Card-3.title: Open Vim
Card-3.imgAlt: Landing page with a mock terminal and scrolling side bar for lesson tracking.
Card-3.text: An interactive tutorial to get started.

Card-4.title: Vimsheet
Card-4.imgAlt: Landing page with a diagram showing the vim movement keys.
Card-4.text: A vim cheatsheet with lots of basic and advanced commands.

Card-5.title: Vim Awesome
Card-5.imgAlt: Landing page showing the most popular vim plugins.
Card-5.text: For vim addons/plugs & themes. Good for extra functionality or styling.

Card-6.title: Vim Plug
Card-6.imgAlt: Youtube thumbnail, 'Vim-Plug: A vim plugin manager.'
Card-6.text: A 11 minute long video going over the basics of the vim plugin manager.

Card-7.title: Vim Plug - Minimalist
Card-7.imgAlt: Youtube thumbnail of the vim logo.
Card-7.text: A quick 5 minute video showing how to use vim-plug.

Card-8.title: Learning Vim in a week
Card-8.imgAlt: Man next to a projector giving a talk at a conference.
Card-8.text: A 24 minute talk about incorporating in your life and basic practice.
